# Tender for Avionics Databus Cyber Security Platform Technology

## Contract Details
* **Contract Number**: cb-103-39215056
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-247846/A
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-07
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-22, at 2:00 pm EST
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

## Contract Description
The Department of National Defence is soliciting a supplier for the supply of a Platform Technology (PT) avionics databus and platform network intrusion detection, continuous monitoring, alerting, integrated hardware and software cyber security solution for use by all Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) aircraft fleets.

The solution requires a suite of tools for building and delivering mission-tailored, end-to-end cybersecurity solutions for aircraft networks, logs, and databus traffic in a common data format.

## Evaluation Criteria
Interested suppliers are invited to submit a statement of capabilities to Captain Kyle Grenier at kyle.grenier@forces.gc.ca by February 22, 2024, at 2:00 pm EST.

## Contract Administration
Please note that this is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), which means that the Department of National Defence intends to award a contract for the selected supplier. However, the department reserves the right to cancel the contract at any time.

## Contract Award
If no supplier submits a statement of capabilities that meets the requirements set out in this notice, the contracting officer may proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.

## Supporting Documents
The complete tender notice, including the terms and conditions, can be found at the following links:
